name: @mariozechner/claude-trace
description: Record all your interactions with Claude Code as you develop your projects

scripts.build: npm run validate:translations && tsc && cp src/interceptor-loader.js src/token-extractor.js dist/ && cp -r src/i18n/translations dist/i18n/ && npm run build:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:core" "npm run dev:copy" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:copy: nodemon --watch src/interceptor-loader.js --watch src/token-extractor.js --exec 'mkdir -p dist && cp src/interceptor-loader.js src/token-extractor.js dist/ && mkdir -p dist/i18n && cp -r src/i18n/translations dist/i18n/'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Mario Zechner
